\hypertarget{classrlbox_1_1tainted__volatile}{}\doxysection{rlbox\+::tainted\+\_\+volatile$<$ T, T\+\_\+\+Sbx $>$ Class Template Reference}
\label{classrlbox_1_1tainted__volatile}\index{rlbox::tainted\_volatile$<$ T, T\_Sbx $>$@{rlbox::tainted\_volatile$<$ T, T\_Sbx $>$}}


Tainted volatile values are like tainted values but still point to sandbox memory. Dereferencing a tainted pointer produces a \mbox{\hyperlink{classrlbox_1_1tainted__volatile}{tainted\+\_\+volatile}}.  




{\ttfamily \#include $<$rlbox.\+hpp$>$}

\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
\subsubsection*{template$<$typename T, typename T\+\_\+\+Sbx$>$\newline
class rlbox\+::tainted\+\_\+volatile$<$ T, T\+\_\+\+Sbx $>$}

Tainted volatile values are like tainted values but still point to sandbox memory. Dereferencing a tainted pointer produces a \mbox{\hyperlink{classrlbox_1_1tainted__volatile}{tainted\+\_\+volatile}}.
